TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_tay_Larepaq, title = Larepaq, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Atayal]}, url = {https://tay.wikipedia.org/wiki/Larepaq} }

S.FORM: alang Larepaq ga niya mki sku Tayto Keng atu Taznin go, kwara sali buwan nya ga 126 buwan, 326 hi ku kwara s'uli tayan. s'uli tayan pinspngan Gyencumin ga 99% kyan ku 324 hi, binah ga, 'yat kahun sku pinspngan Gyencumin ga 1% kyan ku 2 hi nya. pinspung na linhuyan Gyencumin ga, Paywan 96%, Amis 1%, Truku 1%, binah lihuyan s'uli 2%. rhzyal kki'an tay 'zil na Larepaq hya' ga Tjuaqau. rekisi kayal kyokay maki 1 kyokay. ssquliq pinlpgan ppqbaqan qalang Larepaq ga ungat pqwasan biru. tuqi 'san basu kisya' glgan spyangan na pinbahu Ubuy qqmayh

alang Larepaq ga niya mki sko Tayto Keng ato Taznin go, kwara sali bowan nya ga 126 bowan, 326 hi ko kwara s'oli tayan. s'oli tayan pinspngan Gyencomin ga 99% kyan ko 324 hi, binah ga, 'yat kahon sko pinspngan Gyencomin ga 1% kyan ko 2 hi nya. pinspong na linhoyan Gyencomin ga, Paywan 96%, Amis 1%, Troko 1%, binah lihoyan s'oli 2%. rhzyal kki'an tay 'zil na Larepaq hya' ga Tjoaqao. rekisi kayal kyokay maki 1 kyokay. ssqoliq pinlpgan ppqbaqan qalang Larepaq ga ongat pqwasan biro. toqi 'san baso kisya' glgan spyangan na pinbaho Uboy qqmayh
